products.name: Gourmet Burger
products.description: A succulent beef patty topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and our special sauce, served on a toasted brioche bun.

products.name: Mediterranean Salad
products.description: A refreshing mix of crisp greens, feta cheese, olives, and cherry tomatoes, drizzled with a tangy vinaigrette.

products.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
products.description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper, perfectly cooked to al dente.

products.name: Mango Smoothie
products.description: A creamy blend of ripe mangoes, yogurt, and a touch of honey, perfect for a refreshing treat.

products.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
products.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
